name: multiphasic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving several stages or parts: This is just the first step in a multiphasic process. The protective immune response appears multi-phasic. Synonym
multi-phase
More examplesFewer examplesA co-ordinated multiphasic response is needed to address the whole problem. Multi-phasic non-linear models may be useful for interpreting growth profiles. The multiphasic health screening program is designed to identify factors that may predispose patients to major illnesses such as diabetes and heart disease.This multiphasic model distinguishes two steps in water uptake.
